meanings.sent1: The plant extract was found to be estrogenic, promoting hormonal balance.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed an estrogenic medication to help regulate her menstrual cycle.
meanings.sent3: The estrogenic salad dressing made the vegetables feel more feminine.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as estrogenic as a field of blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The estrogenic scent of the perfume lingered in the room.

meanings.definition: Stimulating the development of female characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The estrogenic diet led to a softer skin texture.
meanings.sent2: The toy was designed with an estrogenic influence to appeal to young girls.
meanings.sent3: The estrogenic hairbrush magically transformed his hair into long locks.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had an estrogenic effect on the atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The estrogenic clothing accentuated her curves beautifully.

meanings.sent1: The artificial sweetener had an estrogenic impact on the body.
meanings.sent2: The scientist developed a new compound with estrogenic properties.
meanings.sent3: The estrogenic robot behaved just like a hormonal teenager.
meanings.sent4: The music had an estrogenic quality that resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the essence of an estrogenic sunset.
